rationale: M. bocourti has been assessed as Vulnerable because of an inferred population decrease of more than 30% in the past ten years. This is as a result of high levels of pollution and hydrological alterations, including dams, in both the Chao Phraya and Mekong river basins.
assessor: Jenkins, A., Kullander, F.F. & Tan, H.H.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
